name: Revenge of Guimarães
description:
This game is not finished yet

You are a god that only controls what appears in the hero path, how long can you keep the hero alive?

Your actions:

- Level Up Enemies - Make enemies stronger (More damage and health) but also make them more rewarding (More gold and experience dropped).

- Create Shops - Create shops for your hero to buy items with gold in order to get stronger!

- Create Hospitals - Your hero can only survive for so long, make sure they are healthy for the fight to come!

We are part of a college game dev group called GameDev Técnico.

You can find us here!
